body_html: The current state of Go is that we have a few people who've expressed interest internally in contributing language bindings, but nothing concrete at the moment. I would suggest that if you got started on this, which would be awesome, you could whip up a proposal (preferably in the form of prototype code) and run the design by the discuss mailing list.

body: The current state of Go is that we have a few people who've expressed interest internally in contributing language bindings, but nothing concrete at the moment. I would suggest that if you got started on this, which would be awesome, you could whip up a proposal (preferably in the form of prototype code) and run the design by the discuss mailing list.
